title: BONUS: Leave A Message
description: In this story, comedian Cord Jefferson tells a heartfelt personal story and offers up some illuminating science about the power of the human voice. Support for this episode was provided by the American Foundation for Suicide Prevention: https://afsp.org/.
copyright: Copyright 2014-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: BONUS: Leave A Message
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Why would you leave a message when you can just send a text?
itunes:subtitle: Why would you leave a message when you can just send a text?
